Very good and easy game. The only problem I have with it is that there is too many griefers.
lots of cheaters before LEM but after its fairly fun.

Bought this game forever ago back when it wasn't FTP and its still trash cheaters everywhere in low ranks because now they can get away with it because valve decided a player reviewed community would be good even though theres probably tons of trolls that will let people cheat because it doesn't impact them any. Smurfing=Cheating Change my mind. If you smurf in this game you're part of the problem making it to where this game not only had to go FTP but had to bandwagon with all the other games adding in battle passes and battle royale. Dead game not worth buying prime because theres just mor cheaters there then before because now it has people who actually paid for it instead.

CS:GO bunnyhop ez~ Let's go to Global Elite!

It's like Call of Duty but better.  
By that I mean if I put 30 bullets into you (call of duty), I expect you to die, and you will.

but if I put 4 bullets into you (cs:go), I also expect you to die, and you will.

Custom mode, custom maps, custom guns, custom everything.  Can have bots fill a team or to practice, special events and unlocks.  It's counter strike, what's not to like about it?

Edit: I should note here that whatever my "time played" blah blah, I have over 15 years playing CS as its grown even more time developing maps.

O jogo em sí é muito bom, qualidade de gráficos, jogabilidade etc, mas a pior coisa do jogo são os hackers dentro dele, entre 5 partidas tem 1 hack no minino em uma delas, tirando isso o jogo é maravilhoso

Arkadaşlar hayatınızın hatasını yapmayın bu oyunu sakın alıp oynamayın. Oyunun içerisinde hile kullanmayan çok az kişi var mesela yüzde oranla anlatmak gerekirse %99.98 hile geriye kalan yüzdelik dilimde hilesiz oyuncu geliyor. Bu olayın çözümü olarak hileleri tespit içinde yine sizi ugrastırıp kendi degerli zamanınızı hile kullanan oyuncuları izleyip karar veriyorsunuz 15 20 dk sürüyor. İsteseler 3 günde belki daha kısa sürede çözüm üretebilirler ama her oyun gibi rant saglandıgı için bunu iş olarak görüyorlar. Devletlerin politik saçmalıkları gibi. Allah sizi korusun bu oyunu indirmenize mani olsun tüm melekler ve diger tüm varlıklar engel olsun bulaşmayın amin.

Worst hit reg i've seen on a modern shooter and how can a game with a competitive scene like this have so many hackers. Rank doesn't matter, specially if you don't have prime you are bound to find hackers.

You can literally never get sick of this game. Sometimes it gets boring and I quit the game for a few months for another game, but I'll always come back to CS. 10/10 would recommend as long as you have the right mindset(don't rage too easily b/c of hackers and trolls).
